title: Microsoft Imagine Cup Competition
summary: Finished as runners-up in Nigeria at the Microsoft Imagine Cup Competition.
detail:
In 2011 we applied for, and qualified for Microsoft Imagine Cup competition, under Software
 division, with the ePAQ software. It was a national event open only to students of tertiary institutions.
 We finished 2nd, partly because ePAQ had no internet feature built into it.

links.text: Winners at Microsoft Imagine Cup 2011, Nigeria
